citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Item IACUC 2.31 b 3 ii
At the time of inspection, while reviewing IACUC records it was determined that the non affiliated member has not
participated in any IACUC meetings for almost a year.
The facility needs to review its non affiliated community member status and insure its community member is able to
participate as an active member of the IACUC in accordance with the regulations.
Correct from this date 11/18/14
Exit interview took place at the end of inspection
